intro: Hello, I'm Divakaran Senthilkumar, a passionate student in Computer Science and Engineering. I firmly believe that education is the key to realizing our dreams and potential. I'm dedicated to pushing my boundaries, both in and out of the classroom, and I'm committed to achieving my academic goals. I'm confident that through education, I can make a positive impact on society. I look forward to being part of a community of learners, collaborating with my peers and professors to excel academically and personally. My goal is to use my knowledge and skills to bring about positive change in the world.

academic.sslc: Government higher secondary school , palapatti, Namakkal(DT),TamilNadu
academic.hsc: Kandaswamy Kandar Matriculation and higher secondary school,Paramathi-velur,Namakkal,Tamilnadu

Attended online session on "Building your first Python project - Personal Chat Assistant" conducted by Techlearn.
Certified in "Python Programming For Beginners" through Tech Learn online course.
Successfully completed an internship [17-12-2021 to 17-1-2022] as a "Campus leader at Techlearn.live, demonstrating exceptional leadership skills and team management.
participated in the Paper Techrix [Cyber security] and Code Debugging events at Horizon'22 in Velalar College of Engineering and Technology.
participated in paper presentation [Cyber threats], Code Guru, web designing, and Just a Minute events at Asthra 2022 in  K.S.R. College of Engineering.

Completed "The Complete ReactJs Course - Basics to Advanced [2022]" on Udemy, gaining expertise in ReactJs development.

Participated in inter-college technical fest, Udhayam'23 at KIT-Kalaignarkarunanidhi Institute of Technology, in paper presentation on Ecommerce product comparison and Code Hunters and Code Debugging events.
Completed "successfully completed the course CSS - Basics to Adv for front end development" on Udemy

projectsContent.title: Personal voice assistant
projectsContent.description: Developed a Python-based Personal Voice Assistant enabling Google search functionality and custom command execution.

projectsContent.title: Virtual resume
projectsContent.description: Developed a virtual portfolio using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to showcase my design and development skills.Implemented responsive design techniques to ensure optimal user experience across various devices.

projectsContent.title: Celsius Converter Application
projectsContent.description: Developed a Celsius Converter Android application using Android Studio and dependencies, enabling conversion of Celsius to Fahrenheit, Rankine, and Kelvin.

projectsContent.title: Ecommerce product comparison
projectsContent.description: Developed an Ecommerce product comparison application using JavaScript libraries to compare products from Amazon and Flipkart, demonstrating proficiency in web development and data analysis.

projectsContent.title: Portfolio
projectsContent.description: Developed a responsive personal portfolio using ReactJS to showcase my skills

projectsContent.title: Ablaze 2023 (Symposium website)
projectsContent.description: Developed a department symposium website, providing event details and registration information. The website garnered 1350+ visitors, enhancing event outreach and online presence.

projectsContent.title: Learn IT (E-learning Platform)
projectsContent.description: I've developed and demonstrated a subscription module on an online course platform using React.js, Express.js, Firebase, and MongoDB.

projectsContent.title: Github Profile Checker
projectsContent.description: Built a ReactJS app that displays a user's Github details using Github's API.
